column3: HSC stands for Higher Secondary School, meaning classes 11th & 12th.

ICDS is a government program for early childhood nutrition, preschool education, health, and maternal care.
PAD works with ICDS centres (Anganwadis) to:

Support child nutrition

Reduce malnutrition and anaemia

Provide awareness programs for mothers

Ensure early childhood education

Create safe environments for toddlers and young children

ICDS is important for PADâ€™s early childhood and mother-child health components.
A Panchayat is the local self-government of a village or group of villages.
Villages are the grassroots level where PAD works directly with people
